profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.2.11 Fonts - 6.2.11.8 Use of .notdef glyph
profile.description: A PDF/A-2 compliant document shall not contain a reference to the .notdef glyph from any of the text showing operators, regardless of text rendering mode, in any content stream.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium
